import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { ISelectListCustomer } from "../models/selectListCustomer"; import { IStatus } from "../models/status"; import { CreateOrderService } from "../services/create-order.service"; @Component({ selector: 'create-order', templateUrl: './create-order.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-order.component.css'] }) export class CreateOrderComponent implements OnInit { selectCustomers: ISelectListCustomer[] = []; selectStatuses: any[] = []; selectedValue: any; selectedStatusValue: any; constructor(private createOrderService: CreateOrderService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.createOrderService.getSelectListCustomers().subscribe(data => { this.selectCustomers = data; console.log(data); }); this.createOrderService.getSelectListStatuses().subscribe(data => { this.selectStatuses = Object.entries(data).map(([id, title]) => ({ id: +id, title })); console.log(data); }) } }
